long_description: The MSR Alpine(TM) water bottle is made of 18-8 stainless steel to stand up to your adventurous lifestyle. Quick-connect adapter lid and external bottle threads allow the bottle to integrate with all MSR water filters (sold separately). Bottle is easy to open no matter the size of your hand. Collar on the bottle keeps things quiet when you screw and unscrew the lid. Small drink port in screw cap makes it easy to sip without spilling. The MSR Alpine water bottle is 100% BPA free.
short_description: The MSR Alpine(TM) water bottle is made of 18-8 stainless steel to stand up to your adventurous lifestyle.
